INST1:
You are about to take part in an experiment that involves attending to stimuli on a screen.

Your task is to respond as quickly as possible whenever you see the red circle. Do not respond to the fixation cross: '+'. Response time will be displayed after each trial.

Make a response to begin.
FOOTER: Respond to red circle, not to cross
TOOFAST: TOO FAST! Wait for the stimulus.
DEBRIEF: This task is now complete. Make a response to finish.
